record.title: NOMINATION OF RICHARD SULLIVAN, TO BE UNITED STATES DISTRICT JUDGE
record.chair: The clerk will report the next nomination.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, for all Members, this will be our last vote. There will be a voice vote following this vote. On Monday, July 9, starting at 5:30 p.m., maybe even 5:15 p.m., we will have a series of three or four rollcall votes.
Madam President, I ask for the yeas and nays on this nomination.

record.chair: Is there a sufficient second? There is a sufficient second.
record.narrative: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I announce that the Senator from South Dakota (Mr. Johnson) is necessarily absent.

record.chair: Are there any other Senators in the Chamber desiring to vote?
record.narrative: The result was announced--yeas 99, nays 0, as follows:
